forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 69, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 3 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 60. West southwest wind 5 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
A pleasant afternoon graces Downtown San Francisco, bathing the city in a gentle golden light, as the sun asserts its presence, casting shadows that dance across the charming streets. Temperatures hover near the inviting peak of 69, with a soft breeze meandering in from the west-southwest, occasionally playfully lifting the hair around your ears. While pockets of the city enjoy a crisp clarity, whispers of clouds trail in from the bay, hinting at an afternoon veiling. The anticipated fog has not yet completely claimed the day, although a subtle marine layer lurks nearer the horizon, blending the azure sky with the cool blue of the waters below.

As twilight approaches, a gentle veil of clouds will settle in, soothing the vibrancy that the day has held. With temperatures expected to dip slightly to around 60 in the evening, a light jacket or sweater may provide comfort as you stroll along the picturesque waterfront or find solace in a quaint café. The burgeoning dusk offers a serene canvas for contemplative walks in the park, or perhaps a leisurely visit to one of the myriad artisanal shops dotting the neighborhoods. Engage with the living tapestry of this bustling city; perhaps indulge in an afternoon delight at a nearby eatery, where the flavors of San Francisco intimately intertwine with moments shared.
